items.sentence: Tom said he couldn\'t remember where Mary lived.

I know you\'re probably wondering why I\'m here.
Nobody knew that Tom could speak French so well.
Not even Tom knew when Mary was going to arrive.
Our French teacher gives us a test every Monday.
Your problem is you believe everything Tom says.
Let\'s bring manufacturing jobs back to America.
